Reason: The REUSE_SPACE configuration option in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. When the REUSE_SPACE value is increased, it allows for more efficient use of memory by reusing space that would otherwise be wasted. This can lead to reduced memory consumption and improved performance. Conversely, decreasing the REUSE_SPACE value may result in increased memory usage and potentially slower execution times, making it a performance-sensitive configuration option.
